projects.title: NEX-WEBS Tools
projects.description: A comprehensive suite of web tools including XML Sitemap Generator, Image Compressor, and SEO tools.(just need an API key for some tools to work)
projects.detailed_description: NEX-WEBS Tools is a powerful collection of utilities designed to help developers and businesses optimize their web presence. The suite includes tools for SEO analysis, performance optimization, and content management. With features like XML sitemap generation, image compression, and metadata analysis, users can significantly improve their website's performance and visibility.

tech_details.frontend: Next.js with TypeScript for type safety
tech_details.performance: Optimized with code splitting and lazy loading

projects.title: NEXTJS-WEBSITE
projects.description: A creative portfolio website with interactive elements and smooth animations, showcasing various projects and skills.
projects.detailed_description: This portfolio website demonstrates advanced Next.js capabilities with a focus on user experience and modern design principles. The site features custom animations, interactive components, and optimized performance metrics. The responsive design ensures a consistent experience across all devices.

tech_details.frontend: React with TypeScript for scalable components
tech_details.animations: Framer Motion for smooth transitions and effects

projects.title: CPU & GPU Bottleneck Calculator(AI-Agent)
projects.description: A modern and intuitive NFT marketplace design with dark theme and glass-morphism effects.
projects.detailed_description: The CPU & GPU Bottleneck Calculator is an advanced tool that helps users identify performance bottlenecks in their computer systems. Using AI-driven analysis, it compares CPU and GPU specifications, evaluates their compatibility, and provides detailed recommendations for optimizing performance. The tool includes visual representations of bottlenecks and personalized upgrade suggestions.

tech_details.design: Figma for UI/UX with custom component library
tech_details.animation: After Effects for performance demonstration animations
tech_details.data: Extensive hardware database with performance metrics

projects.title: WEB-APP-(Gratuity Calculator 2025)
projects.description: This tool simplifies the complex process of gratuity calculation, ensuring you have a clear understanding of your entitlements.
projects.detailed_description: The Gratuity Calculator 2025 is a comprehensive tool that factors in the latest regulations and policies to provide accurate gratuity estimations. It includes features for different employment scenarios, various country regulations, and detailed breakdowns of calculations. The tool also provides downloadable reports and historical calculation tracking.

tech_details.frontend: React with responsive forms and visualization
tech_details.backend: Node.js for calculation logic and data processing
tech_details.ai: TensorFlow.js for predictive analysis of financial trends

projects.title: Invisible Character Generator(Web-App)
projects.description: This tool is designed to help you generate and copy invisible characters easily.
projects.detailed_description: The Invisible Character Generator is a specialized utility for digital content creators and developers. It generates various types of invisible Unicode characters that can be used for spacing, formatting, and special effects in digital content. The tool includes a preview feature to test the characters in different contexts and a quick-copy functionality for easy integration.

tech_details.frontend: Vue.js for reactive interface and state management
tech_details.backend: Python scripts for character generation algorithms
tech_details.database: Firebase for user preferences and history

projects.title: Morse Code Translator(Web-App)
projects.description: Express yourself with unique Morse Code productsâ€”perfect for personalized gifts, home decor, and more. Speak in dots and dashes today!
projects.detailed_description: The Morse Code Translator is an interactive web application that converts text to Morse code and vice versa. It includes audio playback of the Morse code, visual representations, and customizable speed settings. The application also includes a learning mode for users unfamiliar with Morse code.

tech_details.design: Figma and Adobe XD for high-fidelity mockups

newly_added_projects.title: NEWLY ADDED: 3D Portfolio Website
newly_added_projects.description: A 3D website showcasing immersive experiences with interactive elements and stunning animations.
newly_added_projects.detailed_description: This cutting-edge 3D portfolio website pushes the boundaries of web technology to create an immersive digital experience. It features interactive 3D models that respond to user input, custom shader effects that create unique visual atmospheres, and a seamless navigation system that guides visitors through different project environments.

tech_details.framework: React Three Fiber for component-based 3D development
tech_details.animation: GSAP for timeline-based animations and transitions
tech_details.performance: Optimized asset loading and level-of-detail rendering

newly_added_projects.title: NEWLY ADDED: Fullstack Dashboard
newly_added_projects.description: A complete dashboard solution with authentication, analytics, and real-time data visualization.
newly_added_projects.detailed_description: The Fullstack Dashboard is a comprehensive solution for business intelligence and data management. It provides a secure authentication system with role-based access control, real-time analytics that process and visualize data streams, and customizable reporting tools.

tech_details.frontend: Next.js 14 with App Router and React Server Components
tech_details.database: MongoDB with Prisma ORM for type-safe queries
tech_details.styling: Tailwind CSS with custom design system
tech_details.auth: NextAuth.js with OAuth 2.0 and role-based permissions
